title: Beautiful and Spacious 1 Bedroom Victorian Apartment Available Today!
posting_body: This gorgeous 1 bedroom/1 bathroom flat in a charming five unit Victorian at 1755A Greenwich Street priced at $3,395 is in a fantastic location, tucked between Greenwich Street and Filbert Street, so there is almost no noise from the street even though it is located in the heart of Cow Hollow.

Fort Mason, the Mascone Recreation Center, Allyne Park are all within a few blocks of the building in addition to fantastic restaurants, nightlife, and shopping along Union Street, Lombard Street, and Chestnut Street.
Newly painted walls, floorboards, cabinets, and doors
Brand new carpeting and flooring throughout
A spacious kitchen with a separate dining room
Tons of storage in the unit
Water, garbage, recycling, and compost included
There will be an open house this Saturday, August 6, from 12:15-1.
If you can't make that, please reach out to schedule a showing.

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
